thread.title: Liverpool sweating over Dejan Lovren injury as Reds return to training ahead of Tottenham clash
thread.title_full: Liverpool sweating over Dejan Lovren injury as Reds return to training ahead of Tottenham clash

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Liverpool sweating over Dejan Lovren injury as Reds return to training ahead of Tottenham clash
text:
Sport Liverpool sweating over Dejan Lovren injury as Reds return to training ahead of Tottenham clash Lovren missed Saturday's defeat at Hull due to a knee problem and will be assessed to determine the extent of the injury Share Dejan Lovren is struggling with a knee injury (Photo: Julian Finney) Share Get Liverpool FC   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Liverpool will make a check on injured defender Dejan Lovren when the players return to Melwood on Tuesday. 
Lovren missed Saturday's defeat at Hull due to a knee problem and the centre-half will be assessed to determine whether he needs to be sent for further testing. 
Boss Jurgen Klopp will be desperate to get the 27-year-old back available again ahead of Saturday's crunch clash against Tottenham. 
The Reds have endured a disastrous start to 2017, and will be hoping to end their wait for a first Premier League win. Read More Jurgen Klopp's men are on a nightmare run of form (Photo: Reuters) Roberto Firmino looks down in the dumps (Photo: Andrew Powell) 
Klopp's men have tasted victory just once since the turn of the year, but that came in the FA Cup replay against lowly Plymouth. 
A five-game winless streak has seen them slip out of contention for the title race - and out of the Champions League places as well. 
It's Liverpool worst start to a calendar year for 63 years, and Klopp will spend the next four days at Melwood trying to arrest that slide. Read More
